testcase.name: As a user I can successfully log into the store
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page ✅ When I login with standard_user and secret_sauce✅ Then I should be on the inventory page

testcase.name: As a user I see an error with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page ✅ When I login with locked_out_user and secret_sauce✅ Then I should see an error message saying Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.

testcase.name: As a user I see an error with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: ✅ Given I am on the login page ✅ When I login with standard_user and wrong_pass✅ Then I should see an error message saying Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service
